涉殺16名船員 韓首次經板門店遣送朝鮮2居民

07 Nov 2019, 09:54

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】韓國7日首次透過板門店遣送朝鮮居民。統一部發言人李相旻表示，政府下午將2名越界南下的凶殺案嫌犯驅逐出境。
韓聯社報導，韓國今天下午3時10分已將2人經由板門店遣送朝鮮。2人所乘坐的漁船8日將送還朝鮮。
李相旻表示，這2人都是20多歲的男性，涉嫌在東部海域北方限界線（NLL）附近海域殺害同一漁船上的16名船員後棄屍逃逸。
統一部人士透露，經調查後，這2人承認殺人棄屍，但是具體犯罪情況應由朝鮮深入調查。
韓國政府則表示，這2人涉嫌殺人重罪，不屬於政治犯和庇護對象，還可能對韓國公民的生命安全造成威脅，不能視為國際法上的難民，決定驅逐他們。
(責任編輯：盧勇信)

Killing 16 crew members, Han first sent 2 North Korean residents through Panmunjom

07 Nov 2019, 09:54

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 07, 2019] South Korea first sent North Korean residents through Panmunjom on the 7th. Li Xiangqi, spokesman of the Ministry of Unification, said that in the afternoon, the government deported two murder suspects across the border.
The Yonhap News Agency reported that South Korea had sent two people to North Korea through the Panmunjom at 3.10 pm today. The fishing boat for 2 people will be returned to North Korea on the 8th.
Li Xiangyu said that the two men were men in their 20s who were suspected of escaping from the corpse after killing 16 crew members on the same fishing boat in the waters near the northern limit line (NLL) in the eastern seas.
According to a person from the Ministry of Unification, after investigation, the two people admitted to killing and abandoning their bodies, but the specific crimes should be investigated in depth by North Korea.
The South Korean government said that the two people were suspected of murder and felony. They were not political prisoners and asylum seekers. They may also pose a threat to the safety of Korean citizens. They could not be regarded as refugees in international law and decided to expel them.
(Editor: Lu Yongxin)
